meta.title: Architecture | Dev Showcase
meta.description: Folder structure, organization patterns, data flow and technical decisions of the Dev Showcase project.

hero.title: How the project is organized
hero.description: Learn about the folder structure, adopted patterns and technical decisions that guide Dev Showcase development.

structure.title: Code organization
structure.description: Each folder has a clear responsibility, facilitating navigation and maintenance.

app.name: src/app/
app.description: App Router routes — each folder is a route, with page.tsx, loading.tsx and metadata.

features.name: src/features/
features.description: Domain components grouped by functionality — each feature is isolated and self-contained.

components.name: src/components/
components.description: Shared and reusable components — UI primitives, layout, navigation.

lib.name: src/lib/
lib.description: Utilities, configuration, helpers — i18n, SEO, rate limiting, animations.

messages.name: messages/
messages.description: JSON translation files per language — pt-BR, en, es, de.

hooks.name: src/hooks/
hooks.description: Reusable custom hooks — scroll lock, media queries, etc.

patterns.title: Code conventions
patterns.description: Consistent patterns that every contributor should follow.

featureSlice.title: Feature Slices
featureSlice.description: Each feature has its own folder in features/ with isolated components, hooks and data. The index.tsx exports the main component.

barrelExports.title: Barrel Exports
barrelExports.description: Each feature exports via index.tsx. External imports use @/features/name, never access internal files directly.

serverClient.title: Server vs Client
serverClient.description: Components are Server by default. Only those using hooks, state or events receive 'use client' at the top.

i18nNamespaces.title: i18n Namespaces
i18nNamespaces.description: Each page has its JSON namespace. New pages must create the JSON, register in load-messages.ts and types.d.ts.

sharedComponents.title: Shared Components
sharedComponents.description: HeroSection, SectionWrapper, SectionNav, AnimatedSection — reused across all pages for consistency.

dataFlow.title: How data flows
dataFlow.description: From server to client, each layer has a clear responsibility.

i18n.title: Internationalization
steps: next-intl injects into the global provider

api.title: Internal APIs
steps: Rate limiting validates IP and limits

decisions.title: Why these choices?
decisions.description: Each architectural decision was made based on real trade-offs.

appRouter.title: App Router (not Pages Router)
appRouter.reason: Server Components by default, nested layouts, streaming, native generateMetadata.

nextIntl.title: next-intl (not next-i18next)
nextIntl.reason: Native App Router support, strong typing, no route rewrites, simple namespaces.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS v4 (not CSS Modules)
tailwind.reason: Utility-first accelerates development, visual consistency, native dark mode, automatic tree-shaking.

framerMotion.title: Framer Motion (not CSS animations)
framerMotion.reason: Declarative animations, reusable variants, viewport control, exit animations.

monorepo.title: Single repo (not monorepo)
monorepo.reason: Single-scope project. One repository keeps the workflow simple for contributors.
